Introduction
This topic contains examples of definite periods of schedular temporary total evaluation, including
example 1: staged rating of definite period of schedular temporary total evaluation
example 2: staged rating of definite period of schedular temporary total evaluation
, and
example 3: staged rating of definite period of schedular temporary total evaluation
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section D - Other Temporary Total Evaluations
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section D
